tips.autoHide: This node will automatically hide the AI sidebar when not in use.

help.description: An intelligent IoT assistant powered by AI that can understand natural language commands and interact with IoT devices.

details.overview: This node provides AI-powered assistance for IoT device management and automation. It can process natural language inputs, understand device states, and execute commands through connected APIs.
details.features: Key features include natural language processing, device state monitoring, automated responses, and integration with multiple AI providers.
details.aiSidebar: The AI sidebar provides an interactive interface for communicating with the AI assistant directly from the Node-RED editor.
details.autoHide: The auto-hide feature automatically minimizes the AI sidebar when it's not actively being used, keeping your workspace clean.
details.configuration: Configure the node by selecting an API configuration, setting response parameters, and defining device interaction rules.

tips.apiKey: Your API key will be stored securely and encrypted.
tips.differentModels: Use different models for planning and execution phases.

validation.apiKeyFiltered: Invalid characters removed from API key. Only ASCII characters are allowed.

help.description: Configuration node for AI service providers including DeepSeek, OpenAI, and Anthropic APIs.

details.overview: This configuration node manages connections to various AI service providers. It handles authentication, model selection, and API parameters for seamless integration with AI services.
details.providers: Supports multiple AI providers including DeepSeek, OpenAI, Anthropic, and other compatible services. Each provider offers different models and capabilities.
details.apiKey: Secure storage and management of API keys for different service providers. Keys are encrypted and stored safely in the Node-RED credential system.
details.models: Configure specific AI models for each provider, including GPT-4, Claude, DeepSeek models, and custom endpoints. Model selection affects response quality and cost.
details.advanced: Advanced options include custom endpoints, timeout settings, retry logic, and response formatting parameters.

configuration.steps:
1. Select your AI service provider
2. Enter your API key
3. Choose the appropriate model
4. Configure advanced settings if needed
5. Test the connection
configuration.validation: The configuration automatically validates API keys and tests connectivity to ensure proper setup.
configuration.security: API keys are stored using Node-RED's secure credential system and are never exposed in flows or logs.
